episodes.name: Surah Yusuf
episodes.description:
*Shaykh Yasir accidentally missed point #42*
Point 42: When you have wronged someone, you should ask them for forgiveness, like the brothers of Yusuf did. They asked their father, and their brother, and repented to Allah. That is true repentance.
In this episode of The Message of the Quran, Shaykh Dr. Yasir talks about Surah Yusuf!
